channel.title: Game crashes at launch
channel.description:
When I launch the game I can see the image which is at the background of the start menu and the loading in the corner, but then the game crashes with the message:
Engine Error SetupArrayProps_R: array prop '(null)' is at index zero
Can anyone help? I'm almost done with the game so it would suck if Ihave to uninstall and then start all over again.

item.title: Game crashes at launch
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
